reviewtext: I needed a lightweight set of headphones for computer gaming (as not to annoy the neighbors) and also a set to do guitar over-dubbing on my 4 track recorder. These have an amazing depth of solid sound to them for the budget price and are comfortable to have on. I've shared these as gifts -- and am I going to get another pair for my other audio devices? I just did. Highly recommended.
summary: Astonishing sound quality for the price. Good old Panasonic.
